original_text: Then will we give our daughters unto you, and we will take your daughters to us, and we will dwell with you, and we will become one people.
korean_text: 우리 딸을 너희에게 주며 너희 딸을 우리가 데려오며 너희와 함께 거주하여 한 민족이 되려니와

sentences.original_text: Then will we give our daughters unto you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 우리는 우리 딸들을 너희에게 주겠다

sentences.original_text: and we will take your daughters to us
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 너희 딸들을 우리에게 데려오겠다

sentences.original_text: and we will dwell with you
and we will become one people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 한 백성이 될 것이다
